name: Knocker, Meropis
script:
knockareacheck = gmcp.Room.Info.num

if knockareacheck == 57177 then
  cecho("\n<white>+--------- MEROPIS KNOCKER EXITS ---------+")
  cecho("\n<white>|    North: Northern Vasnari Mountains    |")
  cecho("\n<white>|    Northeast: Squall Cleft              |")
  cecho("\n<white>|    East: Daoric Plains                  |")
  cecho("\n<white>|    South: Mirror Caves                  |")
  cecho("\n<white>|    West: Northern Scrublands            |")
  cecho("\n<white>+-----------------------------------------+")
end
